headline.main: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists
headline.print_headline: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists

lead_paragraph: The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research poll on the national identity of the United States was conducted by NORC on Feb. 16-20. It is based on online and telephone interviews of 1,004 adults who are members of NORC's nationally representative AmeriSpeak panel.
